uniques.name: Calamity
uniques.desc: Set the world ablaze and burn along with it.

uniques.name: Fractured Crown
uniques.desc: Few goals have cost more lives than the quest for power.

uniques.name: Snowblind
uniques.desc: Blind with the snow, never blinded by it.

uniques.name: Artor's Legacy
uniques.desc: The great wolf Artor ran with Heorot in times long forgotten.

uniques.name: Boneclamor Barbute
uniques.desc: "The essence of the bone seemed to reverberate within my skull. Singing and dancing into a song of fortifying vigor. Never have I felt so alive." - Ethenus, First Legate of the Immortal Legion.

uniques.name: The Kestrel
uniques.desc: May the dying breaths of your enemies put air beneath your wings.

uniques.name: Doublet of Onos Tull
uniques.desc: The horns of the Immortal Empire fill the hearts of the living with fear, and the bones of the dead with glory.

uniques.name: Prism Wraps
uniques.desc: The elements shift like light through a prism. If you control the prism you control the elements.

uniques.name: Urzil's Pride
uniques.desc: Strength of mind and strength of body are a potent combination.

uniques.name: Exsanguinous
uniques.desc: Crazed is the mind of a blood starved Lich.

uniques.name: Yrun's Wisdom
uniques.desc: Yrun was wise in battle, but not in his betrayal of Heorot.

uniques.name: Titan Heart
uniques.desc: Heart of stone, blood of gravel.

uniques.name: Valeroot
uniques.desc: The roots of Eterra grow through stone and flesh and time.

uniques.name: Vipertail
uniques.desc: The bite of the viper brings lethargy and death.

uniques.name: Ward Trail
uniques.desc: Many things are fickle, few more so than life itself.

uniques.name: Chains of Uleros
uniques.desc: Tether yourself to this mortal realm.

uniques.name: Mourningfrost
uniques.desc: Spread ice with every step, like frost before sunrise.

uniques.name: Stormtide
uniques.desc: Rest was a sin among the messenger priests of Lagon, and these boots would punish the wearer accordingly.

uniques.name: Eterra's Path
uniques.desc: Life grows in your footsteps.

uniques.name: Riverbend Grasp
uniques.desc: Move with the fluidity of water, relax and you can react without resistance.

uniques.name: Fighting Chance
uniques.desc: Fight for your life.

uniques.name: Wing Guards
uniques.desc: Speed is its own accuracy.

uniques.name: Beast King
uniques.desc: The King of Beasts leads the charge.

uniques.name: Taste of Blood
uniques.desc: A bloody fervor clouds the mind.

uniques.name: Tempest Maw
uniques.desc: A last sign of favour bestowed to those doomed to fight for Lagon's amusement in his sunken arena.

uniques.name: Frozen Ire
uniques.desc: An alliance of wengari and nomads gathered in the northern tundra, forging weapons of ice and preparing to reclaim Heoborea from the Immortal Empire.

uniques.name: Culnivar's Claim
uniques.desc: Culnivar, last scion of Liath, was a symbol of hope for the living slaves of Thetima.

uniques.name: Humming Bee
uniques.desc: Bzzzzzzzzzz

uniques.name: Eye of Reen
uniques.desc: Dance through the flames.

uniques.name: Cinder Song
uniques.desc: An ode to fires past.

uniques.name: Alchemist's Ladle
uniques.desc: Infused with countless potions, its effects are unpredictable.

uniques.name: Reach of the Grave
uniques.desc: The touch of death reaches far beyond the grave.

uniques.name: Bone Harvester
uniques.desc: Some kill without a purpose. Acolytes kill for the harvest.

uniques.name: Hammer of Lorent
uniques.desc: Lorent may be gone, but its memory will remain with you as you grow.

uniques.name: Torch Of The Pontifex
uniques.desc: Pontifex Yulia, High Priest of the Immortal Empire, would sacrifice entire villages and raise burning soldiers from the ashes.

uniques.name: Storm Breaker
uniques.desc: Strike with the power of the storm.

uniques.name: Draalsting
uniques.desc: Poison the mind, kill the heart.

uniques.name: Morditas' Reach
uniques.desc: Boundless ambition enshrined in ice.

uniques.name: The Last Laugh
uniques.desc: When the headsman's blade falls, Sarno laughs in triumph.

uniques.name: Volcanus
uniques.desc: Crafted in the Divine Era in the great forges beneath the mountains of Rahyeh.

uniques.name: Dreamthorn
uniques.desc: Eater of dreams, weaver of nightmares.

uniques.name: The Slab
uniques.desc: Some slabs mark the dead, this one marks the living.

uniques.name: Close Call
uniques.desc: Light on your feet, with a foot in the grave.

uniques.name: Soul Bastion
uniques.desc: The weight of souls is too much for most.

uniques.name: Rahyeh's Light
uniques.desc: Burn with the fire of the eternal sun.

uniques.name: Strong Mind
uniques.desc: Stand Fast.

uniques.name: Bleeding Heart
uniques.desc: Drink the blood of the weak.

uniques.name: Chimaera's Essence
uniques.desc: Shifting, Changing, Striking.

uniques.name: The Claw
uniques.desc: A wolf never hunts alone.

uniques.name: Death Rattle
uniques.desc: The rattle of the dying is the sound of weakness leaving the world.

uniques.name: The Fang
uniques.desc: A wolf never hunts alone.

uniques.name: Orian's Eye
uniques.desc: The future burns within the prophetic lense.

uniques.name: Ring of the Third Eye
uniques.desc: Forsee the strikes, imbue them with power.

uniques.name: Arboreal Circuit
uniques.desc: You can search round and round, but you are seeking an illusion.

uniques.name: Hollow Finger
uniques.desc: Only brittle skin remains.

uniques.name: Tome of Elements
uniques.desc: The power of the elements is greatest in their most primal state.

uniques.name: Grimoire of Necrotic Elixirs
uniques.desc: Take a quaff from draught of undeath.

uniques.name: Soulfire
uniques.desc: The souls of the damned burn with eternal fire.

uniques.name: Valdyr's Chalice
uniques.desc: The blood within is said to reflect the drinker's true face.

uniques.name: Orchirian's Petals
uniques.desc: Petals harvested from the remains of Orchirian the Rampant, still bright with the light of an ancient sun.

uniques.name: Plague Bearer's Staff
uniques.desc: The Plague Bearer wandered far and wide searching for a cure for his affliction and left only death in his wake.

uniques.name: Ignivar's Head
uniques.desc: Dying cinders illuminate the empty skull.

uniques.name: The Scavenger
uniques.desc: Gods may fall and empires crumble, but the furtive scavenger lives on.

uniques.name: Liath's Signet
uniques.desc: For centuries Architect Liath ensured the prosperity of Lagon's realm.

uniques.name: Bloodgeon
uniques.desc: Crush. Maul. Bludgeon.

uniques.name: Ucenui's Sphere
uniques.desc: Ucenui the navigator used his water magic to explore the vast ocean beyond the Isle of Storms. His fate is unknown, but his instrument remains.

uniques.name: Arek's Bones
uniques.desc: The necromancers were careful to keep Arek's mind intact while they extracted the bones from his flesh.

uniques.name: Maehlin's Hubris
uniques.desc: Maehlin devoted his life to Rahyeh. Seeking to learn his will he reached into the god's mind. Rahyeh reached back into his and set his blood aflame.

uniques.name: Heirloom of the Last Nomad
uniques.desc: The last nomad wandered the northern wastes in the dying days of the Ruined Era, searching in vain for a living soul among the void and snow.

uniques.name: Fiery Dragon Shoes
uniques.desc: Embers of a dragon's heart still linger in these smoldering scales. Dire hits threaten to stoke a wrath that has long slumbered.

uniques.name: Jungle Queen's Chaps of Holding
uniques.desc: The lack of a bottom means that there is more material for pockets.

uniques.name: Kermode's Cage
uniques.desc: The fury of the spirit bear can not be restrained or subdued, even while confined.

uniques.name: Legacy of the Quiet Forest
uniques.desc: “This branch will protect you, even when I can not.” - the last words Quiet heard from her forest friend.

uniques.name: Suloron's Step
uniques.desc: The rebel Suloron struck deep into Majasa's territory, but his fervour could not save him from the matrons' blades.

uniques.name: The Ashen Crown
uniques.desc: The great crown of the regent of Wyvernfall, bestowed by Rahyeh, recovered from the ruins.

uniques.name: Shroud of Obscurity
uniques.desc: Shrouded in a fetid swamp, disregarded by the gods' watchful eyes, the witches of Urix honed the art of blood magic.

uniques.name: Murama's Hilt
uniques.desc: Xenath broke his father's sword, casting away the cursed blade in resentment of his harsh master, and keeping the hilt as a reminder of his loving parent.

uniques.name: Melvern's Writ
uniques.desc: "If Liath will not afford me guards I will purchase my own. Deliver this writ to Skalnir, along with the gold, and bring me back enough mercenaries to secure caravans to Vul'Kaur." - Trade Prince Melvern

uniques.name: Woven Flesh
uniques.desc: The pinnacle of necromancy is to weave undead flesh into any form you desire.

uniques.name: Strands of Souls
uniques.desc: It is unseemly to wear the heads of your foes upon your belt like a common witch or wengari, and what is the point if the eyes can no longer see and the brains can no longer think. No, a necromancer should wear the souls of those they have conquered, a repository of sentient energy ready to consume.

uniques.name: Ribbons of Blood
uniques.desc: The congealing liquid grips tight around your finger, the memories of its vessels passing into those that you summon.

uniques.name: Frozen Eyes of Formosus
uniques.desc: The eyes still stare out, transfixed with longing for the power their owner sought.

uniques.name: Last Steps of the Living
uniques.desc: Step out of the cold, out of the mortal realm, and take your place among the empire.

uniques.name: Atrophy
uniques.desc: Rust and corrosion stand as monuments to the inevitability of time.

uniques.name: Dark Shroud of Cinders
uniques.desc: The dying embers of a god swiling around a blackened cloak.

uniques.name: The Confluence of Fate
uniques.desc: The fall of Eterra is inevitable, as it always has been.

uniques.name: Bulwark of the Last Abyss
uniques.desc: Hold steadfast at the edge of light.

uniques.name: Trident of the Last Abyss
uniques.desc: The dark ocean of void lies still. Echoes are all that remain of the strife that preceeded it.

uniques.name: Coral Aegis
uniques.desc: As storms scour the land, the sea swells and flourishes.

uniques.name: Alluvion
uniques.desc: Waves woven into steel.

uniques.name: Symbol of Demise
uniques.desc: The fate of the world engraved in bone.

uniques.name: Dragonflame Edict
uniques.desc: Go forth and conquer by force or by fire.

uniques.name: Oceareon
uniques.desc: Empires rise and fall like the waves, but the ocean's might is eternal.

uniques.name: Mortality's Grasp
uniques.desc: "The living necromancers of the early empire were quick to take life and to return it. They knew more of the nature of life than any who had come before them, so it is curious that they clung to their own with such desperation. Were these founders of our empire fools and cowards, or did they know something then that we have now forgotten? I wonder if there is something that we have lost in these centuries of undeath." - Recanted texts of Historian Zabat

uniques.name: Gambler's Fallacy
uniques.desc: Just means you're due for a big one, don't worry.

uniques.name: Avarice
uniques.desc: Have the wisdom to know what is rightfully yours and the will to seize it.

uniques.name: Transient Rest
uniques.desc: We follow in the footsteps of our ancestors, but our paths no longer end.

uniques.name: Xithara's Conundrum
uniques.desc: Strong in times of peace, brilliant in the day, generous in times of plenty, and absent when they fade.

uniques.name: Li'raka's Claws
uniques.desc: Scalebane recruits are taught to never travel south of Mes'Ork in groups of less than six. Information on Li'raka's whereabouts are valuable, so it is pertinent that one should escape alive.

uniques.name: Quicksilver Coil
uniques.desc: War is about the destination, not the journey.

uniques.name: Smoke Weaver
uniques.desc: A true assassin must create their own shadows to strike from.

uniques.name: Uethrin's Stand
uniques.desc: Uethrin made his last stand on the shores of Lake Mawn. By dawn all that remained was a pile of Wengari bodies and his line of ballistae standing still and victorious upon the shore. His home was safe for another winter.

uniques.name: Hell Reach
uniques.desc: As Wyvernfall burned nothing could escape the flames.

uniques.name: Drelkor's Compass
uniques.desc: "Enemies lie to the north, south, east, and west, but it matters not whence they come; Welryn must not fall." Drelkor, last Lord of the Lakes.

uniques.name: Gladiator's Oath
uniques.desc: There is no mercy among the sands of the arena. Majasa demands beauty, be it the glory of victory or the dance of blood.

uniques.name: Acidfletch
uniques.desc: From the Radiant Dunes to the Sea of Glass, order corrodes throughout Eterra.

uniques.name: Life's Journey
uniques.desc: Hold fast to the wheel of life, cling tight as it withers your skin and grinds your flesh to dust.

uniques.name: Troaka's Teeth
uniques.desc: Many among the nomads had assumed Troaka slain along with her family, but in truth she still hunted out on the tundra and among the frozen lakes. Except she no longer hunted deer nor eber, only wengari.

uniques.name: Raindance
uniques.desc: Those who seek Lagon's favour dance beneath the moon. Those who seek his adoration dance beneath the waves.

uniques.name: Arrowguard
uniques.desc: "Look only west and trust that the sun itself leads our march. " - Pontixex Aurelus to the auxiliaries of Solarum

uniques.name: Omnividence
uniques.desc: Gaze upon all that will never be.

uniques.name: Sunwreath
uniques.desc: Yield not snow, nor seas, nor sand to the flames of the sun, for it will consume all and remain unsated.

uniques.name: Eulogy of Blood
uniques.desc: Only the whispers of ghosts can be heard among the stillness of the crimson tundra.

uniques.name: Anchor of Oblivion
uniques.desc: Hope pulls you forward, but the anchor ever stays your feet, as is the fate of mortals.

uniques.name: Wings of Argentus
uniques.desc: Falter not before the fire nor the ice, but let your ambition be your wings and soar above them both.

uniques.name: Eye of Storms
uniques.desc: Torrential rain falls upon a dark and churning sea to the deafening sound of thunder and waves. The moon gleams from above and Lagon gazes from below as the centuries pass.

uniques.name: Reign of Winter
uniques.desc: “For us to survive, others must suffer. One day you will accept this truth.” -Morditas, forsaken son of Heorot.

uniques.name: Call of the Tundra
uniques.desc: Jormun slew the great wyverns of Farwood at Heorot's behest, freezing them with his shouts and shattering them with his blades.

uniques.name: Faith of the Frozen
uniques.desc: Found among the frozen corpses in the wake of Morditas' wrath. Runes etched into the handle read "Heorot protect us".

uniques.name: Bhuldar's Wrath
uniques.desc: Shatter! Erupt! This world is only a prison for the immortal flame.

uniques.name: Herkir's Vessel
uniques.desc: Drink deep of the flame, brothers... Immortality awaits.

uniques.name: Logi's Hunger
uniques.desc: Rise! Through fire we are reborn.

uniques.name: Moenia Mentis
uniques.desc: "To survive the void we must build unassailable walls, not just around this town, but around our minds. Do not approach the cultists, do not speak to them." - Eos Falrein, last Archmage of Vul'Kaur.

uniques.name: Ravens' Rise
uniques.desc: As men and gods fight the ravens rise. As the blood settles the ravens alight.

uniques.name: Flight of the First
uniques.desc: Those who ventured outside in the Ancient Era lived in constant terror

uniques.name: Aergon's Refuge
uniques.desc: "Hold fast, maintain the runes! The flames of Rahyeh may envelope this tower, but they shall not penetrate these walls. There is knowledge here that must not burn."

uniques.name: Herald of the Scurry
uniques.desc:
One squirrel, two squirrel, cute and furry
Three squirrel, four squirrel, what's the hurry?
Five squirrel, six squirrel, you should worry
Run and hide, here comes the scurry!

uniques.name: Omnis
uniques.desc: All the stars in the empty sky flicker at once and fade into silence and shadow.

uniques.name: Siphon of Anguish
uniques.desc: The sorrow of those that remain feeds the hungering void.

uniques.name: Stymied Fate
uniques.desc: The end comes slowly, then quickly, then it is all that has ever been.

uniques.name: Apathy's Maw
uniques.desc: Forsake the darkening sky and let the ground swallow your mind.

uniques.name: Shattered Chains
uniques.desc: As he was interred chains fell from the sky. As he was exhumed chains fell from the dead.

uniques.name: Marina's Lost Soul
uniques.desc: Countess Marina revived the cursed land of Urix in the name of the Emperor, unaware that some spirits are better left in the shadows.

uniques.name: Eye of Orexia
uniques.desc: From beneath the dormant volcano, the titan's eye flickers and turns staring into rock and magma.

uniques.name: Leviathan Carver
uniques.desc: Forge Master Rupin'Ur sought to create a weapon capable of slaying any beast, but to most it more resembled a hunk of raw steel.

uniques.name: Lethal Concentration
uniques.desc: "Jade Dust- derived from fossils sold by traders claiming to come from beyond the eastern horizon. Evaluation- Extremely deadly." - Scalebane Master of Poison's Notes

uniques.name: Salt the Wound
uniques.desc: A critical success, a critical failure... It's all in the coin toss.

uniques.name: Azurral's Fury
uniques.desc: The nagasa of the Scorched Basin always warned merchants to disregard the false oasis on the long road to Keltha, but Azurral had never put much heed in the snake people's superstition and his thirst overcame him. He drew deep from the blood red waters. The next day he awoke to his caravan reduced to ash upon the sand and his sword burning hot in his hand.

uniques.name: Sanguine Hoard
uniques.desc: "Our enemies have been hoarding their blood for far too long. Loose the arrows and let it return to Eterra."

uniques.name: Jasper's Searing Pride
uniques.desc: A Warrior's Life burned to ashes and all that's left is pride.

uniques.name: Devotion
uniques.desc: Where your limits end, your faith's test begins.

uniques.name: Fulgurite Shard
uniques.desc: The best weapon smiths of the western isles disregard common metal. They need only the glass left in the wake of Lagon's fury.

uniques.name: Bastion of Honour
uniques.desc: Heed not the cowards that fight from the safety of range, or the generals that sit in their camps while their soldiers' blood spills. Face your foes with honour, a shield, and a good blade.

uniques.name: Rule of the Simoon
uniques.desc: When fire falls in love with the wind, run.

uniques.name: Tongue of the Aberrant Seer
uniques.desc: Litugy in darkness leads only to despair, poison on the tongue beguiles the soul, truth in unwords reveals salvation.

uniques.name: Battlemage's Endeavour
uniques.desc: In times of strife the inflexible are doomed to break. A true Battlemage must master all the arts of war.

uniques.name: Stormhide Paws
uniques.desc: The roar of thunder above the frozen seas has long inspired stories among the nomads of great white bears that prowl the ice beneath the storms.

uniques.name: Darkstride
uniques.desc: Decades after the rest of civilisation hid itself beneath the ground, the last of the void knights still roamed the ruined surface, searching relentlessly for a way to turn the power of the void against itself. Their discoveries remain with them, lost amidst the shadows.

uniques.name: Thorn Slinger
uniques.desc: After making peace with the nagasa, Lord Berant of Skalnir was impatient to secure his legacy and so turned his eyes to an easier conquest. The Verdant Isle was small and his scouts assured him that its druid inhabitants had no weapons. But when his soldiers returned from the sacred island, they brought back only their thorn pierced fallen and tales of vine strangled ships.

uniques.name: Curse of Perseverance
uniques.desc: The last imperial dwelt for centuries beneath Welryn, bound by his own sanctuary to witness the ruin of this world.

uniques.name: Lessons of the Metropolis
uniques.desc: "Stay quick on your feet. Don't get hit once, but if you do get hit once, don't get hit twice" - Dar'Fuun, Scalebane Recruiter.

uniques.name: Kelthan Blasting Agent
uniques.desc: Overseer Nicovus had little patience for the traditional mining techniques of his living predecessors. The empire would delve deep and it would delve fast.

uniques.name: Ravenous Void
uniques.desc: A pair of mimic brothers, lost in the ravenous void, hungry for anyone who dips their hands inside.

uniques.name: Aberrant Call
uniques.desc: A beacon among the eternity of the damned. A call to return to the world of the living, if only for a moment.

uniques.name: Flayer's Pride
uniques.desc: The obscene angles at which the patches of undead skin are arranged belies the unsettling precision required to produce such a steady stream of blood. A treasured implement for any Hemomancer.

uniques.name: Throne of Ambition
uniques.desc: Argentus may have been born a mere slave of Rahyeh, but his ambition eclipsed even his god.

uniques.name: Eternal Eclipse
uniques.desc: The triumph of man and osprix culminates upon the altar of Solarum. A frail sun rises behind an illuminable shadow, spreading a corona of half light upon the ruined world beneath. This feeble shadow is no salvation from the end, but only from the hope of what might have been.

uniques.name: Frostbite Shackles
uniques.desc: All the advances and discoveries of this great empire, yet even in death we remain frozen in place, shackled to this mortal plane.

uniques.name: Stormcarved Testament
uniques.desc: In ancient times it was believed that the will of Lagon could be gleaned from the patterns burned into the stones of the Scoured Reefs, and studied them at great length. Yet a wild storm needs no reason to strike where it does and the inscrutable stones were dismissed by later storm priests, who claimed it did not befit surface dwellers to decipher their god's purposes or designs.

uniques.name: Nightbringer
uniques.desc: Most flee from the encroaching void and cower beneath the soil, but those with greater aspirations do not run from power, however terrifying it might be. Hunt the rifts and you will find what you seek.

uniques.name: Yulia's Path
uniques.desc: Between loyalty and opression, hope and tyranny, the path of wisdom must be found.

uniques.name: Trinity of Flames
uniques.desc: Three souls to nourish an unquenchable flame.

uniques.name: Death's Embrace
uniques.desc: Everything comes with a price - even death.

uniques.name: Paranoia
uniques.desc: In the whispering bull rushes and the swaying leaves, in the howling wind and flickering shadows, everywhere enemies hide.

uniques.name: Prismatic Gaze
uniques.desc:
Time collapsing void
Observation... destruction
Bring her light with you

uniques.name: Chronostasis
uniques.desc: It's the missing beat, the spurious tick of a broken clock, the jolt of sudden realization. As we swing this timeless artifact like frenzied apes, minds future and past laugh at our ignorance.

uniques.name: The Judicator
uniques.desc: It is Rahyeh's duty to pass judgement, and a Paladin's to deliver it.

uniques.name: Aurelis
uniques.desc: The sky's wrath alights in a golden storm.

uniques.name: Tu'rani's Bident
uniques.desc: Matron Tu'rani is still revered amongst the nagasa for leading the first successful campaign against the Osprix. Striking them out of the sky with javelins and thunderbolts, she drove them back into the Mountains of the Sun, liberating the town of Kel'tha.

uniques.name: Roots of Vithrasil
uniques.desc: Root yourself into the cold earth and drink deep from Eterra's bounty.

uniques.name: Usurper's Mandate
uniques.desc: "Only one with the blood and bones of a king may rule. Fortunately, I have both" - Venred the Usurper

uniques.name: Snowdrift
uniques.desc: Let the northwind mold you, cold and howling above the frozen tundra.

uniques.name: Silvafrond
uniques.desc: The life of the forest flows through every root and leaf

uniques.name: Drought's Release
uniques.desc: "Our tribulations shall end with prosperity, and theirs with death" - Grand Alchemist Avello

uniques.name: Thornshell
uniques.desc: Driven from their homes, the Meruna of Sur Soreth settled among the swamps and fens around Urix. Despite their unfamiliarity with the shallows and thickets of their new home, they gradually adapted to it, learning to tunnel through the mud and grow thorns from their shells.

uniques.name: Julra's Stardial
uniques.desc: "By the movement of the stars, thirteen centuries have passed, are ruins all that remains?"

uniques.name: Somnia
uniques.desc: The very atmosphere is different here, what once slumbered is now awoken and free.

uniques.name: Julra's Obsession
uniques.desc: "This future must not come to pass. Surely there is some way, some power that can avert this horror?"

uniques.name: Vessel of Strife
uniques.desc: The durance of strife is an impossible task. Boiling within, despair's sole fate is to erupt and envelop its vessel.

uniques.name: Shadow String
uniques.desc: Unseen hands strike hardest

uniques.name: Harthenon's Vow
uniques.desc: "My first loyalty is to those who follow me. I will not abandon them" - Harthenon, Last Druid of the Verdant Isle.

uniques.name: Singularity
uniques.desc: "And thus from a singular point of infinite detail did the goddess Eterra weave the fabric of reality" - Book of Elders, Chapter 1.

uniques.name: Chronicle of the Damned
uniques.desc: The souls of those whose deaths are inked within these pages are bound to the book itself, forever cursed to serve the reader.

uniques.name: Diothaen's Bloody Nib
uniques.desc: "Some say the pen is mightier than the sword. Sacrificing your blood to write the words, now there’s real power." - Archmage Diothaen

uniques.name: Torkrefin's Hunger
uniques.desc: The nomads around lake Mawn were optimistic as Grand Matriarch Torkrefin rose to power among the nearby Wengari. She had at first seemed more civilised than the average Wengari, carrying a giant sword instead of a crude axe or club. Nevertheless she proved particularly difficult to reason with on account of her propensity to devour their envoys.

uniques.name: Face of the Mountain
uniques.desc: The face of the mountain yields no emotion as waves, weather, and time crash upon it.

uniques.name: Immolator's Oblation
uniques.desc: The pyromancers following the Fire Lich, Cremorus, perfected the technique of burning their own souls to fuel their dark magic.

uniques.name: Penumbra
uniques.desc: Honour has no place in the arena. To defeat the mightiest foes, a champion must dance on the edge of shadows, preparing for the perfect moment to strike.

uniques.name: Soul Gambler's Fallacy
uniques.desc: When coins run out, you still have your soul to gamble.

uniques.name: Burning Avarice
uniques.desc: Have the ambition to know what might be yours, and the conviction to burn those who would keep it from you.

uniques.name: Scales of Lemniscate
uniques.desc: A weapon wielded in service of the cycle. Surrender both hope and despair to serve eternity.

uniques.name: Hive Mind
uniques.desc:
"Why is that decoy buzzing?"
"That's not a decoy, it's a beecoy!"

uniques.name: Gathering Fury
uniques.desc: Lightning does strike twice

uniques.name: Aaron's Will
uniques.desc: "Guilty as charged, I was being daft, but raising bones is my craft." - C.N.B

uniques.name: Lament of the Lost Refuge
uniques.desc: "I can hear them skitter, scratching at the walls. Their cries echo through these caverns like the wails of those lost outside. Just rats for now, but ‘they’ are lost no longer, they come back to us now, but different - corrupted."

uniques.name: Branch of Hallows
uniques.desc: Most druids talk to their woodland kin, rarely do the trees consider their fleshy brethren. Some branches seek a host to commune with, be it a man, beast, or treekin. Madness touches all in different ways.

uniques.name: Unstable Core
uniques.desc: Whether wrapped in shadows, barriers, blessings, or armor, the storm reduced them to ash.

uniques.name: Liath's Machinations
uniques.desc: With careful planning and precise instruments, one can bring order even to a flame.

uniques.name: Red Ring of Atlaria
uniques.desc: One of seven enchanted rings that were all believed to be lost when Atlaria vanished beneath the waves.

uniques.name: Shadow Beacon
uniques.desc: Once light fades, only darkness can guide those who remain.

uniques.name: Telf'un's Mirage
uniques.desc: Fascinated by mirages, Telf'un long wandered the deserts, telescope in hand. Even after decades of study and delirium he failed to truly comprehend their nature, but eventually the mirages took pity on the old man and turned him into one of their own.

uniques.name: Firestarter's Torch
uniques.desc: "By Rahyeh's will this town shall burn!"

uniques.name: Rotmind
uniques.desc: The witches of the Red Marsh learned to cultivate a type of magical fungus within their own skulls. The mycelium grew eagerly into their brains, twisting their minds, but the powers it bestowed were well worth their sanity.

uniques.name: The Ghost Maker
uniques.desc: A precise and expertly crafted tool for cutting a soul from a body

uniques.name: Jelkhor's Blast Knife
uniques.desc: Jelkhor was once the greatest archer and artificer in all of Majasa's domain. Eventually the diamond matrons grew fearful of his popularity among the human populace, and so they accused him of a terrible crime and had his left hand severed, so that he could no longer wield a bow. Though disgraced and outcast, Jelkhor's resolve remained and his ingenuity gave him the tools he needed to deliver his revenge.

uniques.name: Fragment of the Enigma
uniques.desc: When the scholars of Vul'Kaur realised the artifact's power, they shattered it immediately and told not even Majasa of their discovery.

uniques.name: Hand of Judgement
uniques.desc: The light of divinity!

uniques.name: Harbinger of Stars
uniques.desc: Above the skies the natural and the arcane are one.

uniques.name: Bo's Anarchy
uniques.desc: The streets of Maj'elka engender no love for authority

uniques.name: Apostate's Sanctuary
uniques.desc: "The gods serve only themselves, foolish mortals. They will not protect you. If you wish to survive, you must forge your own sanctuary."

uniques.name: Pillager's Gold
uniques.desc: The mercenary guilds of Skalnir care naught for the destruction they leave in their wake, as long as their pay is fair and they can take a cut of the spoils.

uniques.name: Apogee of Frozen Light
uniques.desc: Formosus knew not what cause these warriors had fought for, or what ancient conflict left their bodies frozen upon the outer ice. But, as he felt the rage and power of their lingering souls he knew well what purpose they would now fulfill.

uniques.name: Swaddling of the Erased
uniques.desc: "Cities, memories, whole timelines have been erased by the spreading void. There is much work ahead of us." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Font of the Erased
uniques.desc: "For those who have lost everything, The Weaver's bounty knows no end."  - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Cradle of the Erased
uniques.desc: "Rest now, you are safe here in this cocoon. It's all gone now, but this is not where your thread ends." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Advent of the Erased
uniques.desc: "Those long lost may walk again on woven feet" - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Dedication of an Erased Primalist
uniques.desc: "A protector of wilds long lost shall now serve a greater purpose" - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Knowledge of an Erased Mage
uniques.desc: "Such insight wasted on a lost timeline. It is for naught now, but it proves thy worth." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Code of an Erased Sentinel
uniques.desc: "Memories of past honour that befits the woven form" - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Ambitions of an Erased Acolyte
uniques.desc: "The context of thy aspirations is long lost, yet they still pervade thy silken form." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Gambit of an Erased Rogue
uniques.desc: "It is no accident that you have outlasted your world, but belief in one's own luck is a powerful tool." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Howl of the West Wind
uniques.desc: Dark clouds roll in from the Sea of the Storms

uniques.name: Cycle of Putrescence
uniques.desc: "The cycle of life and death is forever shattered. Our cities shall not crumble and our citizens shall not yield or die at the whims of a winged devil. We shall persist. Our bodies may whither and decay, but even when we fall we return and persist again. Glory to the new cycle. Glory to persistence and decay. Glory to humanity." - Thelocus, Imperial Governor of Argentum

uniques.name: Static Shell
uniques.desc: The carapace of a meruna storm ogre makes for an impressive trophy, and an effective cuirass.

uniques.name: Reowyn's Fortress
uniques.desc: "I have long travelled the north, Aergon. I have seen the great stone ruins at Reimhaven and Kolheim and I have seen the frozen blood of their ancient defenders. No tower can stand forever and those walls shall not avail you when the flames descends. You must strike first." - Reowyn's last letter to the mages of Oerden's Watch.

uniques.name: Blood of the Exile
uniques.desc: Fleeing does not stem the flow

uniques.name: Crest of Unity
uniques.desc: In the waning years of his reign Lord Drelkor forbade the mages of Welryn from focusing their studies on any single element, lest their research lead them to aligning with forces beyond his domain.

uniques.name: Abacus Rod
uniques.desc: "Runes provide order to magic, a way to shape it, harness it, and use it for one's will. Follow their structure and you shall remain in control, break it and you shall loose the madness between the lines." - Arch Runemaster Unvar to the college of Kolheim.

uniques.name: Elecoe's Abandon
uniques.desc: "I do not need to mend the wounds that a dead foe had not the chance to inflict" - Elecoe the Alchemist Thief

uniques.name: Transcriber's Graver
uniques.desc: Carve the burning nightmares into stone

uniques.name: Box of Hydrae
uniques.desc: Deep within her research of Geometromancy, Runemaster Heraclea was surprised to discover a shape that behaved as if it had many heads.

uniques.name: Fundamental Criterion
uniques.desc: Discard freely the paths not taken. They are only distractions from deeper knowledge.

uniques.name: Frey's Retreat
uniques.desc: "The city is lost. All remaining garrisons are to head north. The great roots and ancient wards of Farwood shall be our last stronghold against the horde. And, Heorot Willing, it will be their tomb." - Arch Cryomancer Frey, Champion of Heorot.

uniques.name: Merophage
uniques.desc: Forged by Archmage Drinial for his remaining son, it carries a powerful enchantment to draw out yearning. Now, its wielders unburdened, the sword itself yearns for its shattered kin.

uniques.name: The Cuckoo
uniques.desc: A puppet crafted to hold a transient spirit. It seems merely avian in nature, but it's impossible to shake the sense of unease that builds as one looks into those carved black eyes.

uniques.name: Wheel of Torment
uniques.desc: The torment of consumed souls lingers within their devourer.

uniques.name: Communion of the Erased
uniques.desc: "Hark, disparate souls, for you have been blessed. Together you shall imbibe the venom of new life." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Stygian Coal
uniques.desc: The congealed loathing of souls trapped beneath the earth. Ample fuel for the destruction to come.

uniques.name: Sigeon's Reprisal
uniques.desc: "The best protection is the enemy's fear of retaliation" - General Sigeon

uniques.name: Spine of Malatros
uniques.desc: The withered dragon Malatros taught his followers the art of chthonic fire and sorcery. The rage of dragons would not die with him.

uniques.name: Blood Roost
uniques.desc: The smell of blood fills the air.

uniques.name: Naal's Tooth
uniques.desc: Among the island nomads there was once a legend of a great beastmaster, Gatan Larn, who was so in tune with the paravian kind that he could commune with crows and raptors.

uniques.name: Sword Catcher
uniques.desc: "The wild cannot be protected by unnatural things, by stone walls or iron shields. The flame and steel that would destroy it must be stopped in their tracks and broken by the primal rage of its defenders." - Nomad Chief Thulr

uniques.name: Black Blade of Chaos
uniques.desc: Forged with shadow iron on an unlit moon to claim Lagon's power over elemental chaos.

uniques.name: Orian's Sun Seal
uniques.desc: "Piety need not stay your wings nor slow the winds of conquest." - Grand Haruspex Uranos

uniques.name: Egg of the Forgotten
uniques.desc: The lost scion of light dwells no longer among the sun, nor in the resplendent mountains of the east. It lingers only in the minds of the servants of fire, guiding the hands that carve and chisel.

uniques.name: Harbinger's Needle
uniques.desc: A needle forged by Aberroth in the heart of a black hole. It is designed to be plunged into a powerful foe, to sacrifice them to the dark god of fate.

uniques.name: Bane of Winter
uniques.desc: Time thaws all winters

uniques.name: The Inevitable
uniques.desc: All timelines fade and the Harbingers flock like crows to the remains.

uniques.name: Phantom Grip
uniques.desc: The one armed smith, Draelyn, perfected the art of controlling her animated weapons as if she were holding them with her own hand. Though lauded throughout the forges of Solarum, she was secretive about her methods, and this lead to rumours that she invoked necromancy in her craft, and some even swore they had glimpsed spectral fingers gripping her weapons as she fought.

uniques.name: Yrun's Penance
uniques.desc: Like Yrun himself, the former champion's blade was imprisoned in bark and ice.

uniques.name: Plague Dragon's Tongue
uniques.desc: In the early days of Welryn, the archmage Sinveri led the assault to slay the plague dragon, Quolahron, last scion of Uhkeiros, and save the town's fields from blight. The dragon fell, yet, like many mages of Welryn, Sinveri did not lack ambition, and took Quolahron's crystal tongue, to research and wield its dark power.

uniques.name: Nihilis
uniques.desc: From every void, every lost moment, the will of Orobyss echoes for eternity.

uniques.name: Wall of Nothing
uniques.desc: Cloaked in the void, Harbingers need fear naught.

uniques.name: Aberroth's Command
uniques.desc: "Be the instrument of ruin, that which delivers time's atrophy, and fate's damnation."

uniques.name: Seed of Ekkidrasil
uniques.desc: From the minds of the devoted grows the roots of the tree of nothing

uniques.name: Null Portent
uniques.desc: Gorge on the prophecies of futures lost

uniques.name: Fingers of the Phantom Mire
uniques.desc: A drained bog seeks vengeance

uniques.name: Monument of Protection
uniques.desc: A shield dedicated to the great warrior, Arek, who gave his life to repel death from the city's walls.

uniques.name: Event Horizon
uniques.desc: All must pass beyond the brink

uniques.name: World Splitter
uniques.desc: Sever the chains that bind reality

uniques.name: Tolmat's Incorrect History of Eterra
uniques.desc: Written by an esteemed historian, this book chronicles the entire history of Eterra as we understand it. Or, at least, as Sir Tolmat understood it.

uniques.name: Mantle of the Pale Ox
uniques.desc: Fight with the strength of an ox and the wisdom of a spirit

uniques.name: Phalanx
uniques.desc: It was not just Liath's magic and machinery that drove the Wengari threat from Thetima's walls, but the discipline and order her generals instilled in her human soldiers.

uniques.name: Gordian Prism
uniques.desc: "What is innovation without the power to prove its worth? If you present me a solution that is outperformed by a raw expression of power then you have brought me nothing!" -Runemaster Gordian

uniques.name: Crystalwind
uniques.desc: The wind chimes sing within the mines

uniques.name: Elecoe's Innovation
uniques.desc: Elecoe discovered that with the right ingredients potions could be imbued with the luck of the brewer.

uniques.name: Orb Weaver's Fang
uniques.desc: "You are the blade that will cut the imperfections from the Weaver's web." - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Nest of Nightmares
uniques.desc: "I was surrounded by golden silk, curious creatures, and Her words filling my very soul." - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Essence Weaver
uniques.desc: "Imagine a world free of pain, chaos, and sorrow. A world free of corruption. A perfect world!" - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Weaver's Gift
uniques.desc: "The Weaver is the greatest artist of all, to grace Her domain is a blessing." - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Inheritance of the Erased
uniques.desc: "Our tears for them will be dew upon perfect golden silk." - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Shattered Worlds
uniques.desc: The unrestrained power of countless shattered timelines, condensed into a vortex of possibility

uniques.name: Downfall of the Righteous
uniques.desc: They told me not to do it, now I know why

uniques.name: Brewmaster's Buckle
uniques.desc:
They say beer makes you bold
I say it makes you unbreakable

uniques.name: Executioner's Tithe
uniques.desc: The Immortal Empire conquered death and brought freedom to humanity. Yet in that freedom, there remained one inevitable certainty... the tax claimed from their very souls.

uniques.name: The Land Before
uniques.desc: Before the falling of the temple and the strife of gods, there was peace between the osprix, the wengari, the meruna, and the nagasa.

uniques.name: Legends Entwined
uniques.desc: All stories grow from the same roots

uniques.name: Harmony of the First
uniques.desc: The first of osprix, wengari, meruna, and nagasa were united in purpose, under the guidance of the gods and Eterra above them.

uniques.name: Onslaught of Cerata
uniques.desc: Impale upon the horns of primordial might

uniques.name: Blossom of Immortal Stone
uniques.desc: Three petals unwithered by time

uniques.name: Carrion of Creation
uniques.desc: "From blood all is brought forth, and to blood all shall return." - Ullur Sandhoof, first neophyte of the Coagulated Titan.

uniques.name: Horn of the Bone Wisp
uniques.desc: Wisps once took physical form upon the shifting surface of Eterra

uniques.name: Mask of Indifference
uniques.desc: A visage unweathered by even time itself

uniques.name: Permanence of Primal Knowledge
uniques.desc: The vines grow with strange symbols, the meaning of which has long been lost to time.

uniques.name: Wings of Discord
uniques.desc: Osprix elders used to tell of the Quetzal Dragons, resplendant with wings of mismatched feathers, who were never seen to roost in the same place twice. The elders speculated that having visited every peak and forest in Eterra, they traveled far over the sea in search of new lands.

uniques.name: Whetstone Gavel
uniques.desc: All is judged according to its creation

uniques.name: Truesight Glass
uniques.desc: Looking through the right glass can reveal the weaknesses of a foe, the gaps in its armor drawing the eye like resplendant orbs of gold.

uniques.name: Evolution's End
uniques.desc: A fossil of a lineage forged in time

uniques.name: Spirit Xylem
uniques.desc: The crystal wood inside carries spirits to their rightful destination

uniques.name: Bones of the Ancestral Pack
uniques.desc: Ghosts lay the tracks of the living

uniques.name: Architects of Astral Blood
uniques.desc: The noblest of ancient beasts wore their hearts in the sky
